snippet: Fighting between Nigeria’s military and the radical Islamist sect Boko Haram killed at least 24 people in the northeastern city of Maiduguri, officials said Tuesday.
abstract: Fighting between Nigeria’s military and radical Islamist sect Boko Haram kills at least 24 people in northeastern city of Maiduguri.
lead_paragraph: Fighting between Nigeria’s military and the radical Islamist sect Boko Haram killed at least 24 people in the northeastern city of Maiduguri, officials said Tuesday.
